headline: Looking At The Narrative For Take Two Interactive Software TTWO After GenAI And GTA Updates
summary: The latest update on Take-Two Interactive Software fine tunes the model rather than rewrites it, with fair value moving slightly from about US$277.40 to roughly US$278.23 per share. That shift mainly reflects small changes in the discount rate, now about 9.08% instead of 9.17%, and a modestly higher revenue growth assumption of roughly 15.22% versus 15.08%, as analysts factor in GenAI efficiency ideas and stronger signals from recent content drops like December’s “Safehouse in the Hills” for...
